display_long_description:
Love Jungle Man? Please leave us a rating or a review! It helps us out a lot, and we appreciate all your voices. Tell us what you want to see next!

# Vine Swinging Madness! 
 Climb, swing, flail, and fall using only your hands as you guide **Jungle Man** through dynamic, procedurally generated obstacle courses that react to your real-world space.
[media]

*Jungle Man requires a minimum playspace of (3x4m/10x13ft).

# Over 70 Increasingly Complex Levels!
Get good or die trying. Never before has a game like this been available in MR. Turn your home into a vine-swinging obstacle course in **Jungle Man**—a fast, funny, and totally chaotic action-puzzler. Made exclusively for mixed reality on **Meta Quest 2, 3 and 3s**. No controllers needed. We've perfected hand tracking.
 
[media]

# 3 Chaotic Realms to Conquer!
 Explore the Jumping Jungle, Slippery Swamp, and Volcanic Vein—each packed with creatures, traps, and swing-driven chaos. Every run is a surprise!
[media]

# Win Relics. Unlock Outfits. Smash Stuff.
 Collect Relics and earn Achievements to unlock wild new looks and extras. The more you play (and fail), the more ridiculous things get.
[media]

# Swing. Die. Repeat!
Smack into rocks, tumble into quicksand, or get up close and personal with angry bees. It’s all part of the journey—and the laughs. He's fearless, but entirely too confident. Even after a hilarious wipeout, this prehistoric caveman bounces right back up, ready to swing again!
[media]

**© 2025 Megaverse LLC, a Fun Train® company.**
